title: The Pink Panther
resume: The Pink Panther is a 1993 animated television series. It was credited as a co-production of Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Animation, Mirisch-Geoffrey DePatie-Freleng and United Artists and distributed by Claster Television. This is the only The Pink Panther in the TV series not to distributed by MGM Television, though MGM still owns The Pink Panther.
